charaepi_ch0025_00_suzuna/2301_0401_0500:

treacherous if you’re not super careful.
Make sure you stay focused out here, OK?
charaepi_ch0025_00_suzuna/2301_0302_0600: No, but it’s pretty c-cold out here...
charaepi_ch0025_00_suzuna/2301_0402_0700:
Duh! These are glaciers!
Of course it’s gonna be cold!
charaepi_ch0025_00_suzuna/2301_1201_0800:
This place could easily become a disaster zone
if we get a surprise blizzard coming through!
charaepi_ch0025_00_suzuna/2301_1201_0900:
Abomasnow, would you be a doll and
go shield [Name:PlayerNickname ] from the
wind for a bit?
charaepi_ch0025_00_suzuna/2301_1201_1000:
You really should be more
careful, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
charaepi_ch0025_00_suzuna/2301_1201_1100:
And, well...I should learn to follow my
own advice every once in a while, too.
charaepi_ch0025_00_suzuna/2301_0401_1300:
It was a long time ago, but yeah...
I got stranded in the mountains during
a really bad snowstorm once.
charaepi_ch0025_00_suzuna/2301_0402_1500:
Well, it was a long time ago, but I got
stranded in the mountains during a
really bad snowstorm once.
charaepi_ch0025_00_suzuna/2301_1201_1600:
There’s a flower that only blooms up in the
snowiest mountain peaks, and one day,
I decided to go hiking to try to find one.
charaepi_ch0025_00_suzuna/2301_1201_1700:
But while I was up there, I got caught in an
unexpected blizzard and accidentally veered
off the trail.
charaepi_ch0025_00_suzuna/2301_1201_1800:
I was lost and freezing... I almost lost
hope altogether. I didn’t think anyone was
going to rescue me.
charaepi_ch0025_00_suzuna/2301_1201_1900:
But then Abomasnow here came out of
nowhere and saved my life!
charaepi_ch0025_00_suzuna/2301_1201_2000: I was barely conscious by then...
charaepi_ch0025_00_suzuna/2301_1201_2100:
but I remember feeling like I was being
carried down the mountain by a big,
fluffy Pokémon.
charaepi_ch0025_00_suzuna/2301_1201_2200:
When I woke up, the Pokémon was gone.
Somehow, I’d ended up in a cabin in the
mountains, tucked into a warm bed.
charaepi_ch0025_00_suzuna/2301_1201_2300:
Abomasnow here ran off before I even
got the chance to thank her!
charaepi_ch0025_00_suzuna/2301_0301_2400: Guess she was too cool for that.
charaepi_ch0025_00_suzuna/2301_0401_2500: Haha, that’s what I thought at first, too.
charaepi_ch0025_00_suzuna/2301_0402_2700: Haha, that’s what I thought at first, too.
charaepi_ch0025_00_suzuna/2301_1201_2800:
After that whole experience, I just knew
I had to find that Pokémon again somehow.
I wanted to battle with her as my partner!
charaepi_ch0025_00_suzuna/2301_1201_3100:
Not to be mean or anything.
She did it to keep me away from danger.
charaepi_ch0025_00_suzuna/2301_1201_3200:
You see, whenever Abomasnow is around,
big, strong blizzards tend to form...
I think she wanted to protect me from them.
charaepi_ch0025_00_suzuna/2301_1201_3300:
I wasn’t gonna let a little blizzard stop
me, though! I hiked right through those
storms to visit her over and over again.
charaepi_ch0025_00_suzuna/2301_1201_3400:
It took a while, but eventually Abomasnow
gave in and said yes!
charaepi_ch0025_00_suzuna/2301_0301_3500: Your focus must have convinced her!
charaepi_ch0025_00_suzuna/2301_0401_3600:
I think so! My perfect focus somehow
melted through that icy heart of hers.
charaepi_ch0025_00_suzuna/2301_0402_3800:
I think so! My perfect focus somehow
melted through that icy heart of hers.
charaepi_ch0025_00_suzuna/2301_1201_3900: Focus is the key to victory!
charaepi_ch0025_00_suzuna/2301_0401_4300:
Well, I think Abomasnow might have said yes
that day because she was worried about me.
charaepi_ch0025_00_suzuna/2301_0402_4500:
Well, I think Abomasnow might have said yes
that day because she was worried about me.
charaepi_ch0025_00_suzuna/2301_1201_4600:
If I’d continued to visit her up in the mountains,
I would’ve been pelted by her blizzard nonstop.
At some point, I would have frozen over.
charaepi_ch0025_00_suzuna/2301_1201_4700:
Abomasnow wanted to prevent that
from happening, and I believe that kindness
is what makes her strong.
charaepi_ch0025_00_suzuna/2301_1201_4800:
I never found the snow flower I’d gone
searching for on the mountain that day...
charaepi_ch0025_00_suzuna/2301_1201_4900:
but in the end, I found something even
more special than that.
charaepi_ch0025_00_suzuna/2301_1201_5000:
Abomasnow may have a cold, icy exterior,
but she’s got a warm heart on the inside,
and I’m proud to have her as my partner!
